Name: Dead Hungry
About the game: Sink your teeth into the first VR offering from well-known PixelJunk series developer Q-Games! In Dead Hungry, you are a fearless food-truck chef sent to save the zombified citizens of a slightly off-kilter version of Kyoto, Japan. Armed with burgers, soda, and much more, your mission is to sate their hunger and restore their humanity. Feed hordes of ravenous zombie schoolgirls, office workers, and sumo wrestlers to turn them back into productive members of society!
